channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: History’s lessons for new Dow selections Nvidia and Sherwin-Williams
More Millennials and Gen Xers are getting colorectal cancer. Even young adults should watch for these 7 symptoms
item.description: Millennials are at twice the risk for colorectal cancer compared to Baby Boomers.

item.title: Dow futures steady while bonds rally on signs of closer election
Inside ‘returnless refunds,’ where you can get your money back and keep what you bought—a mysterious process many retailers don’t publicize
item.description: Companies like Amazon, Walmart, Target, Shein and Temu understand some items are not worth the cost or hassle of getting them back.

item.title: Trump v Harris election vote leaves corporate America facing $250 billion tax swing
item.description: The difference between Trump's proposed tax policies and those of his opponent, Kamala Harris, amount to a potential 12% swing in corporate net profit...

item.title: Viking Therapeutic shares rally in premarket on weight-loss-pill trial result
Viking Therapeutics stock jumps after ‘great’ trial of weight-loss drug
U.S. factory orders tumbled in September
20-year election official debunks ‘dangerous myths’ about the U.S. electoral process
item.description: Myths about fraud and abuse may grab headlines but don’t represent reality. The U.S. electoral system is among the safest and most secure in the world...

item.title: Blocked users on Elon Musk’s X can once again see your posts
item.description: They cannot, however, interact with them.
